data: Into the picturesque village of Le Faouet, situated in the very heart of Brittany, there drove one morning in the month of May a lady whose spreading grey cloak and the thick veil that covered her face failed to hide her remarkable beauty and perfect grace of figure.
one morning in the month of May
Leblanc, Maurice, 1864-1941; Teixeira de Mattos, Alexander, 1865-1921 [Translator]
